installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

echo "üì• T√©l√©chargement des fichiers depuis GitHub..."
cd /mnt/server

# Nettoyage
rm -rf * .git* 2>/dev/null || true

# T√©l√©chargement via curl/wget
REPO="Axtazer/pelican-WOL"
BRANCH="main"

if command -v curl &> /dev/null; then
  echo "Utilisation de curl..."
  curl -sSL "https://github.com/${REPO}/archive/refs/heads/${BRANCH}.tar.gz" | tar -xz --strip-components=1
elif command -v wget &> /dev/null; then
  echo "Utilisation de wget..."
  wget -qO- "https://github.com/${REPO}/archive/refs/heads/${BRANCH}.tar.gz" | tar -xz --strip-components=1
else
  echo "‚ùå Ni curl ni wget disponible"
  exit 1
fi

if [[ -f package.json ]]; then
  echo "üì¶ Installation des d√©pendances..."
  npm install --only=production
  echo "‚úÖ Installation termin√©e"
else
  echo "‚ùå package.json introuvable"
  exit 1
fi
